div3.head: PROPOSITION 18.

p.hi: If two numbers by multiplying any number make certain numbers, the numbers so produced will have the same ratio as the multipliers.

div3.p: For let two numbers A, B by multiplying any number C make D, E; I say that, as A is to B, so is D to E.
For, since A by multiplying C has made D, therefore also C by multiplying A has made D. [VII. 16] For the same reason also C by multiplying B has made E.
Therefore the number C by multiplying the two numbers A, B has made D, E.
Therefore, as A is to B, so is D to E. [VII. 17]
